name: Voltofalle | Voltorb Flip
description:
A -> Flip

Arrow Keys -> Move

R -> Reset / next stage

Esc -> Close

X -> Enable Marker

While marker is enabled:

1 -> mark as 1

2 -> mark as 2

3 -> mark as 3

Q -> mark as voltorb (trap)

Here is a remake of the mini game voltorb flip.

It is currently in german only but will support english and french in the future. Animations will also be added, as well as sound effects.

Pixelfonts are made by me, using a magnifying glass and my DS with the game running. 

NOTE THAT NOT ALL SPRITES ARE FINISHED
